channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ China University of Geosciences on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: IWBVT: Instance Weighting-based Bias-Variance Trade-off for Crowdsourcing
item.description: IWBVT: A novel instance weighting approach significantly improves model quality in crowdsourcing by mitigating the impact of intractable instances and achieving a bias-variance trade-off.

item.title: KFNN: K-Free Nearest Neighbor For Crowdsourcing
item.description: KFNN dynamically determines optimal neighborhood sizes for label integration in crowdsourcing, significantly boosting accuracy and robustness, especially with limited noisy labels.
